_header: Lord Jesu Christ Gods Son on live
Subjects: Christ, wounds of; prayers, by Christ and His Passion
_description: A simple prayer by the five wounds — one couplet

BodTan407.Transcription:
Lord Ihesu Cryst goddes sone on lyveHaue mercy on vs for thy woundes
                    fyve
